title: ARAM Skin Boost
body:
Currently unable to purchase skin boost in ARAM, it says I don't have enough RP. 
Currently have approx 1200 RP though, is it disabled or am I missing something?

replies.body: same here, since last update cannot skin boost at all.
'ello, and apologies for the late response. Are you still having issues with purchasing skin boosts?
